Description: Small fragment of papyrus inscribed in black ink on one side with part of 7 lines of a letter in Coptic, written against the fibres (verso).
Curator's comments: 'Fragment of a letter asking a churchman, probably Bishop Presentius, to pray for the writer.'
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (380775) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/380775)
Ede 1972- / Writing and lettering in antiquity (no. 57)
